message: Hope some of you at least plan to pick it up. It's fabulous.

It's one of those titles that launched in the time-frame of the 3DS launch, has been overlooked by many. Makes me think of Final Fantasy right off the bat. Kinda got pushed one side once the PS2 launched.
FF9? So, wait, it's really bad?
Wow, I'm surprised to see all the Final Fantasy 9 hate going around... then again, mentioning FF and Okamiden in the same title is enough to help Mr_V ignore DiRT 3 (Scary thought?)
I get the hate for FF8 (even though it's wrong), but 9? C'mon. Vivi. C'moooooooon.
FF9 is the 2nd only to FF7 as far as post-SNES FF games go IMO.
And I don't hate FF8! FF8's great!
Vivi is the only good thing about FF9.
